metadata.description:
Thanks to old friend Simon V. and SantorinRecordings (http://www.santorin.de), we havea guest-release extra-ordinaire in a wickedbdrum+snare stylee. This particular bass-b00meris actually released as a real 12-inch single onSantorin - but they've actually given it to us toput out for free on m211 too. Youch, d+b witha real twisted analogue edge.

So nod your head hard to the menacing koolroc bass action, and go seek out the originalvinyl in the shops so you can perform the essentialreeeee-wind. :) Booyaka booyaka?
metadata.title: Simon V - Screwdriver [mtw013]
metadata.subject: Electronic
